data.text: Kpɔ ɖa, Yehowa ƒe alɔ mele kpuie akpa be mate ŋu aɖe ame,
ke boŋ miaƒe nu vɔ̃woe ma mi
elabena miaƒe asiwo ƒo ʋu,
Ame aɖeke meli si gblɔna be
Woƒoa da ƒe aziwo, eye wolɔ̃a yiyiɖɔ.
Woƒe yiyiɖɔ menyo na avɔ o.
Woƒe afɔwo ƒua du gena ɖe nu vɔ̃ me,
Womenya ŋutifafa ƒe mɔ o.
eya ta nuteƒewɔwɔ le adzɔge na mi,
Miele asi tsam le gli ŋu abe ŋkugbagbãtɔwo ene,
Mi katã miele gbe tem abe sisiblisiwo ene,
elabena míaƒe dzidadawo sɔ gbɔ le ŋkuwò me
siwo nye aglãdzedze,
Ale wonya ʋɔnu dzɔdzɔe dɔdrɔ̃ do ɖe megbe,
Ale nyateƒe mele afi aɖeke woakpɔ o,
Yehowa kpɔ be ame aɖeke meli o.
Edo dzɔdzɔenyenye abe eƒe akɔtakpoxɔnu ene,
Axe fe na wo ɖe nu siwo wowɔ la nu.
Ɣetoɖoƒetɔwo avɔ̃ Yehowa ƒe ŋkɔ,
Yehowa be, “Ɖela ava Zion na Yakob ƒe

Yehowa be, “Nye la, esiae nye nye nubabla kpli wo. Nye Gbɔgbɔ si le dziwò, nye nya siwo metsɔ de nuwò la madzo le nuwò alo le viwòwo ƒe nu alo le wò dzidzimeviwo ƒe nu tso azɔ dzi yi ɖe mavɔ me o,” Yehowae gblɔe.
